title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\ListControlsRequest
name: ListControlsRequest
description:
Request for ListControls method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.ListControlsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: Optional. Maximum number of results to return. If unspecified, defaults to 50. Max allowed value is 1000.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: Optional. A page token, received from a previous ListControls call. Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

params.name: data.filter
params.description: Optional. A filter to apply on the list results. Supported features: List all the products under the parent branch if [filter][google.cloud.retail.v2.ListControlsRequest.filter] is unset. List controls that are used in a single ServingConfig: 'serving_config = "boosted_home_page_cvr"'

methods.name: getParent
methods.description:
